DataElement.preferredDefinition: A character string for one or more paragraphs which may include the Graphic Character set and some Control Characters to describe additional information about the patient's medical history.  [Standard-based]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Additional information about the patient's medical history.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Added; extra. (from American Heritage Dictionary):The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.

Concepts.definition: The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 7/20/11 - Released as part of cleanup review.  9/17/07  CDE created to support DICOM CDE IE & DICOM Attribute-DICOM VR Rep term format.  Needed for NCIA model load.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: LT: A character string for one or more paragraphs with leading spaces significant; trailing spaces being non-significant.   It may contain the Graphic Character set and some Control Characters.   [Standard-based]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).

ValueDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 6/21/07-Released for NCIA CDE curation.  2007 DICOM Standard - Sections 5 & 6

DataElement.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElement.changeDescription: 7/20/11 - Released as part of cleanup review.   9/17/07  CDE created to support DICOM CDE IE & DICOM Attribute-DICOM VR Rep term format.  Needed for NCIA model load.
